snippet: American chefs and gourmet food trucks are captivating Parisian palates.
abstract: American chefs and gourmet food trucks are captivating Parisian palates.
lead_paragraph: Americans have been eagerly crossing the Atlantic just to gorge themselves in Paris for centuries, but their gastronomic passion has never been even remotely reciprocated, until now. Three of the city's best new modern bistro chefs are American, and Paris's first gourmet food truck, Le Camion qui Fume, selling blue-cheese burgers, caramelized onions, frites and more, was recently outfitted by Kristin Frederick, a Californian.

headline.main: Eurofile | The New American Tastemakers in Paris
